languages.text: [Принести пленных в жертву Истинным богам] "Вы искупите свое предательство. Я пролью вашу кровь, чтобы в бою мне сопутствовала удача".
[Sacrifice the prisoners to the true gods] "You will pay for your treason. I will spill your blood so that fortune might favour me in battle."
languages.original_text: [Принести пленных в жертву Истинным богам] "Вы искупите свое предательство. Я пролью вашу кровь, чтобы в бою мне сопутствовала удача".

languages.text: [Die Gefangenen den wahren Göttern opfern] "Ihr werde für Euren Verrat bezahlen. Ich werde Euer Blut vergießen, damit mir das Glück in der Schlacht hold ist."
languages.original_text: [Sacrifice the prisoners to the true gods] "You will pay for your treason. I will spill your blood so that fortune might favour me in battle."

traits.locale_text: [Die Gefangenen den wahren Göttern opfern] "Ihr werde für Euren Verrat bezahlen. Ich werde Euer Blut vergießen, damit mir das Glück in der Schlacht hold ist."

languages.text: [Sacrifier les prisonniers aux Vrais Dieux] « Vous paierez votre trahison. Je verserai votre sang pour m'attirer les faveurs de dame Fortune au combat. »
languages.original_text: [Sacrifice the prisoners to the true gods] "You will pay for your treason. I will spill your blood so that fortune might favour me in battle."

traits.locale_text: [Sacrifier les prisonniers aux Vrais Dieux] « Vous paierez votre trahison. Je verserai votre sang pour m'attirer les faveurs de dame Fortune au combat. »

languages.text: [Sacrificar a los prisioneros a los Dioses Verdaderos] «Pagaréis por vuestra traición. Derramaré vuestra sangre para que la fortuna me favorezca en combate».
languages.original_text: [Sacrifice the prisoners to the true gods] "You will pay for your treason. I will spill your blood so that fortune might favour me in battle."

traits.locale_text: [Sacrificar a los prisioneros a los Dioses Verdaderos] «Pagaréis por vuestra traición. Derramaré vuestra sangre para que la fortuna me favorezca en combate».

languages.text: [囚人たちを真なる神々に捧げる]「反逆の代償を払ってもらおう。お前の血を流せば、戦闘中に幸運が私の味方をしてくれる」
languages.original_text: [Sacrifice the prisoners to the true gods] "You will pay for your treason. I will spill your blood so that fortune might favour me in battle."

traits.locale_text: [囚人たちを真なる神々に捧げる]「反逆の代償を払ってもらおう。お前の血を流せば、戦闘中に幸運が私の味方をしてくれる」

languages.text: [将囚犯献祭给黑暗诸神]“你们要为你们的背叛行为付出代价。我要你们血流成河，让我在战斗中好运相伴。”
languages.original_text: [Sacrifice the prisoners to the true gods] "You will pay for your treason. I will spill your blood so that fortune might favour me in battle."

traits.locale_text: [将囚犯献祭给黑暗诸神]“你们要为你们的背叛行为付出代价。我要你们血流成河，让我在战斗中好运相伴。”

languages.text: [Mahkûmları gerçek tanrılara kurban et] "İhanetinizin bedelini ödeyeceksiniz. Kanınızı dökeceğim ki talih, muharebe meydanında benim yanımda olsun."
languages.original_text: [Sacrifice the prisoners to the true gods] "You will pay for your treason. I will spill your blood so that fortune might favour me in battle."
